name: Frozomon
effect: ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)[Your Turn] While your opponent has a Digimon with a digivolution card in play, this Digimon can't attack.
digivolve_effect: [All Turns][Once Per Turn] When a digivolution card of an opponent's Digimon is trashed, return 1 of your opponent's level 3 Digimon to its owner's hand.
